homeDesc: We accelerate the decentralized future by offering DAOs the most composable app and framework. Your DAO, Your Way!
governDesc: Create and vote on proposals with multiple governance options per subDAO
structureDesc: Compose subDAO hierarchies each with their own treasury, governance and permissions
operateDesc: Start with any Safe{WALLET}. Then use our DAO modules & template builder to infinitely expand its functionality
featuredDesc: Here are some organizations already composing unique subDAO hierarchies on Fractal
decentDesc: We are an open-source collective that unites builders toward global decentralization.
awakeDesc: Awake Internet Protocols combine AI and FinTech to empower Decentralized Private Equity for the multiverse. Welcome to Awakened Value Co-creation aka AwakeVC.
learnCTA: Explore the Docs to see how Fractal works
